name: Butter Chicken
steps: 1. Marinate chicken with spices. 2. Cook in butter and cream until done. 3. Garnish with cilantro and serve with naan.

name: Paneer Tikka
steps: 1. Marinate paneer with spices, yogurt, and lemon juice. 2. Grill until golden and serve with mint chutney.

name: Vegetable Biryani
ingredients: Rice, Mixed Vegetables, Spices, Yogurt, Saffron
steps: 1. Cook rice and vegetables with spices and yogurt. 2. Layer and steam with saffron for a fragrant aroma. 3. Garnish with fried onions and serve with raita.

name: Chole Bhature
ingredients: Chickpeas, Flour, Yogurt, Spices, Onion, Tomatoes
steps: 1. Soak chickpeas overnight and cook with spices. 2. Prepare dough and deep fry bhaturas. 3. Serve chickpeas with hot bhaturas.

name: Aloo Paratha
ingredients: Whole Wheat Flour, Potato, Spices, Ghee
steps: 1. Mash potatoes and mix with spices. 2. Roll dough, stuff with the potato mixture, and cook on a griddle with ghee.

name: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: Chicken, Yogurt, Spices, Lemon Juice, Mustard Oil
steps: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, lemon juice, and mustard oil. 2. Grill until charred and serve with a side of onions and mint chutney.

name: Palak Paneer
steps: 1. Cook spinach and blend into a puree. 2. Cook paneer cubes with spices and mix in the spinach puree. 3. Serve with roti or rice.

name: Dal Makhani
ingredients: Black Lentils, Kidney Beans, Butter, Cream, Spices
steps: 1. Soak lentils and kidney beans overnight. 2. Cook with spices, butter, and cream. 3. Serve with naan or rice.

name: Methi Thepla
steps: 1. Knead dough with fenugreek leaves and spices. 2. Roll and cook on a griddle with ghee. 3. Serve with yogurt or pickle.

name: Gulab Jamun
ingredients: Milk Powder, Sugar, Ghee, Water, Cardamom
steps: 1. Make dough with milk powder, ghee, and water. 2. Shape into balls and fry. 3. Soak in sugar syrup with cardamom and rose water.
